item.title: Shanghai Unveils Bold Blockchain And Digital Innovation Plans For Industries
item.dc:creator: Harold
item.description:
Shanghai government releases guidelines to promote blockchain, digital yuan, and metaverse adoption in real-world industries.

Read more...

Coincu News
item.content:encoded:
Key Points:

  • Shanghai government releases guidelines to promote blockchain, digital yuan, and metaverse adoption in real-world industries.
  • The plan includes blockchain-based platforms for commodity trading, e-commerce, and digital transformation in legacy industries.
  • Shanghai’s move aligns with China’s focus on leveraging blockchain’s cost-efficiencies and boosts efficiency in managing commodity settlements with the digital yuan.
The government of Shanghai has taken a significant step in embracing blockchain technologies, the digital yuan, and the metaverse, with a recent publication of guidelines aimed at fostering adoption in various industries. The move aligns with China’s larger goal of integrating blockchain to achieve cost efficiencies in real-world sectors.

The comprehensive plan encompasses the development of blockchain-based platforms for commodity production, supply, and trading, as well as e-commerce platforms focused on industrial products. Additionally, the guidelines aim to facilitate the digital transformation of legacy industries by utilizing blockchain technology.

Key use cases outlined in the guidelines include the implementation of blockchain and IoT technologies to manage carbon emissions and the creation of a blockchain-based platform for the automotive industry. Ge Dongbo, Chief Engineer at the Shanghai Municipal Commission of Economy and Informatization, expressed these initiatives in a recent press release.

The Shanghai report titled “Guidelines on the High-Quality Development of Manufacturing Internet Service Platforms” categorizes blockchain as a core technology alongside artificial intelligence (AI), big data, the Internet of Things (IoT), and the mobile web. This reflects the city’s focus on advancing its manufacturing internet service platforms through cutting-edge technologies.

The latest guidelines build on the three-year development plan for local manufacturing industries, which was released on June 15 and already included provisions for blockchain technologies.

Furthermore, the Shanghai Clearing House, a prominent counterparty and clearing company in Asia, recently introduced support for operations and settlements using the digital yuan, the Chinese central bank digital currency (CBDC). Customers can now settle bulk commodity payments with the digital yuan, streamlining the process and increasing efficiency.

China‘s status as the second-largest global commodities importer in 2021, accounting for $2.68 trillion in purchases, further emphasizes the significance of integrating the digital yuan into commodity settlements.

As a leading hub for China’s blockchain industry, Shanghai had already established its first blockchain industrial complex back in June 2020. The city is also home to AntChain, the blockchain branch of Ant Group, China’s renowned financial technology giant. With these initiatives, Shanghai is well-positioned to further drive innovation and adoption of blockchain technologies in various sectors.

DISCLAIMER: The information on this website is provided as general market commentary and does not constitute investment advice. We encourage you to do your own research before investing.

Read more...

item.title: China’s Digital Yuan Trading Volume Nearly 1.8 Trillion Yuan: Report
item.dc:creator: Foxy
item.description:
Nearly $250 billion worth of transactions have taken place using China's digital yuan in the year and a half since the pilot began.

Read more...

Coincu News
item.content:encoded:
Key Points:

  • China’s digital yuan has been worth about 1.8 trillion yuan (nearly $250 billion) in transactions since the pilot.
  • There have been about 950 million transactions from about 120 million wallets since e-CNY first launched lending in January 2022, with an average transaction amount of about $260.
  • Digital yuan adoption accounts for only 0.16% of China’s currency supply, which is still tiny compared to China’s population of 1.4 billion.
The governor of China’s central bank has announced that nearly $250 billion worth of transactions have taken place using China’s digital yuan in the year and a half since the pilot began.

Of that, there have been about 950 million transactions from about 120 million wallets since e-CNY first launched lending in January 2022, with an average transaction amount of about $260.

The trial is launched to promote cross-border applications of e-CNY further and is the third cross-border trial of a digital yuan in Hong Kong, according to SCMP.

According to Cointelegraph, Yi Gang, governor of the People’s Bank of China, said at a meeting in Singapore that since the first launch of the digital yuan in January 2022, up to the end of June, The transaction volume of the central bank’s digital yuan is about 1.8 trillion yuan.

About 120 million wallets made about 950 million transactions with an average transaction value of about $260. While the adoption and use cases of the digital yuan are expanding, the digital yuan still accounts for only 0.16% of China’s money supply, according to Reuters. So far, e-CNY has been mainly used for retail payments overseas, with some testing in Hong Kong.

The People’s Bank of China (PBoC), the central bank, started working on implementing the e-CNY in 2014. The bank established the China Digital Currency Research Institute in 2016. research, design, and test the system in 2019, launch e-CNY in 2020. This is considered Digital Currency Electronic Payment (DCEP), China’s official digital currency, built by Blockchain technology and cryptography technology. Since then, China has conducted field trials in more than 20 cities nationwide.

With the advent of e-CNY, China’s economy has witnessed a dramatic shift to digitalization. Backed by financial technology (fintech) giants like Alipay and WeChat Pay and an enthusiastic public response to the mobile payments sector, China is rapidly moving towards a cashless society. In big cities like Beijing, even people who live on the streets use QR codes and mobile payment apps to get support. This near-total social, digital transformation shows the potential of e-CNY.

DISCLAIMER: The Information on this website is provided as general market commentary and does not constitute investment advice. We encourage you to do your own research before investing.

item.title: Arbitrum Foundation Grants Phase 1 Targets Apps and Infrastructure
item.dc:creator: Annie
item.description:
Arbitrum has recently revealed its ambitious plans for the first phase of its foundation funding.

Read more...

Coincu News
item.content:encoded:
Key Points:

  • Arbitrum announces ambitious plans for foundation funding to propel DApp development and infrastructure advancement.
  • Foundation grants provide financial backing to projects contributing to Arbitrum growth and sustainability, fostering vibrant and dynamic communities.
  • Unlike traditional grant programs, the initiative will progress in different phases with specific goals and objectives, spanning approximately three months for the first phase.
Arbitrum has recently revealed its ambitious plans for the first phase of its foundation funding.

The foundation grant program is designed to be an ongoing initiative, aimed at propelling the development and adoption of decentralized applications (DApps) and advancing the infrastructure of Arbitrum Nova and Arbitrum One.

The primary focus of the first phase is to bolster the growth and potential of DApps running on Arbitrum, while also enhancing the underlying infrastructure to ensure a seamless and efficient experience for users. With the backing of the foundation grants, developers and innovators within the crypto community can expect to access resources and support to create more powerful and user-friendly technologies.

The grants also carry the objective of fostering sustainable and thriving communities within the ecosystem. By providing financial backing to projects that contribute to the growth of the ARB network, the foundation aims to nurture a vibrant and dynamic community that collaborates to push the boundaries of blockchain scalability and usability.

Crucially, the foundation has clarified that the grant program will progress in different phases, with each phase having specific goals and objectives. However, unlike traditional grant programs, there is no fixed “end date” for these stages. Instead, the program will continue until the Arbitrum Foundation determines that the phase objectives have been adequately met.

Although the first phase’s duration has not been set in stone, it is anticipated to span approximately three months. During this time, developers and project teams will have the opportunity to submit their proposals and ideas for consideration, outlining how they intend to contribute to the advancement of decentralized applications and the Arbitrum infrastructure.

Arbitrum’s foundation funding comes as exciting news for the blockchain and Ethereum communities, as it offers an avenue for innovation and financial support to drive the next wave of cutting-edge DApps and blockchain solutions. The initiative also aligns with the broader mission of scaling Ethereum and addressing the challenges posed by network congestion and high gas fees.

item.title: Memecoin Announced The New Airdrop Of A Total Of 17.25 Billion Tokens
item.dc:creator: Harold
item.description:
Memecoin surprises the community with an airdrop of 17.25 billion MEME tokens, constituting 25% of the total supply.

Read more...

Coincu News
item.content:encoded:
Key Points:

  • Memecoin surprises the community with an airdrop of 17.25 billion MEME tokens, constituting 25% of the total supply.
  • The airdrop encompasses all Memeland NFTs, including MVP, Captainz, and Potatoz.
  • Backed by 9GAG, Memeland aims to become a decentralized and community-driven platform.
Memecoin, a promising player in the cryptocurrency space, has made a significant announcement that has ignited excitement among its community and the broader crypto world.

The project is set to conduct a massive airdrop of its native MEME tokens, amounting to a staggering 17.25 billion tokens. This airdrop represents a remarkable 25% of the total token supply, making it one of the largest token giveaways in recent times.

The airdrop is intended to reward holders of Memeland NFTs, including those from the MVP, Captainz, and Potatoz collections. This move is seen as a strategic step by Memecoin to boost engagement and strengthen its bond with the existing user base while encouraging more participation from the community.

Although the specific distribution plan between unlocked and delayed tokens has not been disclosed yet, the news has sparked a wave of anticipation among Memeland enthusiasts. The launch of the MEME token is projected to take place sometime in July or August of this year, setting the stage for an exciting period of growth and exploration for the project.

Many observers believe that the airdrop, combined with the anticipated token launch, could potentially position MEME as one of the biggest sensations in the crypto space. The project’s focus on creating an inclusive and vibrant ecosystem resonates with the core principles of Web3, attracting attention from both crypto veterans and newcomers.

Memeland, the NFT ecosystem powered by Memecoin, boasts three distinct collections – MVP, The Captainz, and The Potatoz. These collections creatively leverage the culture of memes, combining it with the revolutionary power of non-fungible tokens. The project’s core mission revolves around building and investing in social products that facilitate seamless connections between creators and communities.

While Memeland’s current features are predominantly accessible to NFT holders, the development team envisions expanding the platform into a comprehensive and inclusive Web3 space. The long-term goal is to create a Decentralized Autonomous Organization (DAO) that empowers community members to actively participate in governance and decision-making processes.

Behind the Memeland project stands 9GAG, a well-known name in internet meme culture with an extensive following across various social media platforms. 9GAG’s backing adds credibility to Memeland’s vision and mission, drawing attention from millions of netizens who have been captivated by the platform’s silly and entertaining content for over a decade.

Memecoin’s airdrop announcement is not only a celebration of the project’s growth but also a testament to the rising popularity of NFTs and their potential to revolutionize the way we interact with digital assets. As the Memecoin community eagerly awaits the airdrop event and the upcoming launch of the MEME token, the project’s potential impact on the broader crypto landscape remains a topic of enthusiastic discussion and speculation.

DISCLAIMER: The information on this website is provided as general market commentary and does not constitute investment advice. We encourage you to do your own research before investing.

item.title: Terraform Labs Welcomes Chris Amani As New CEO
item.dc:creator: Annie
item.description:
Terraform Labs has recently undergone significant changes in an attempt to recover from past setbacks.

Read more...

Coincu News
item.content:encoded:
Key Points:

  • Terraform Labs appoints new CEO to revitalize Terra project after May 2022 crisis.
  • Company plans to create applications that “provide real utility”.
  • Terraform Labs has 40 employees working under Amani’s leadership to overcome challenges and achieve success.
Terraform Labs has recently undergone significant changes in an attempt to recover from past setbacks.

According to a report from the Wall Street Journal on July 20th, the company has appointed a new CEO, Chris Amani, who has been with Terraform Labs since 2021, initially serving as COO and later CFO. With this new leadership, the company aims to revitalize the Terra project, which experienced major issues in May 2022 when its stablecoin, TerraUSD, collapsed.

Despite the collapse, Terraform continues to operate in Singapore and Amani has expressed optimism regarding the company’s future prospects. In fact, he believes that Terraform Labs could salvage the Terra project, although he acknowledges that it will take time and effort to achieve the desired outcome. Amani stated that Terraform Labs plans to create applications that “provide real utility,” and has promised to provide further details on these plans in the near future.

Terraform Labs has about 40 employees, all of whom are working towards the company’s goals under Amani’s leadership. Interestingly, the company reportedly has no plans to launch a new stablecoin to replace the failed TerraUSD stablecoin. Instead, it will focus on other aspects of the Terra project to help it recover.

Terraform Labs’ pending recovery plan will differ from or build upon the Terra 2.0 blockchain and Luna Classic (LUNC) token, which are already in operation. However, Amani is confident that the company will find a way to move forward and achieve success.

One major challenge for Terraform Labs is the ongoing legal issues surrounding its former CEO and co-founder, Do Kwon. Kwon faces charges of violations of capital-markets law in South Korea and criminal charges of fraud in the U.S., as well as a separate civil fraud suit from the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC). All of those allegations are directly related to the collapse of his $40 billion crypto project. Kwon has resigned as CEO but retains a controlling share of 92% of the company‚Äôs stocks. Amani did not comment on how broader issues are affecting the company, but stated that Terraform Labs will continue to operate without Kwon’s leadership.

Only 15 of the 40 or so individuals currently employed by Terraform Labs were members of the company prior to its May 2022 crisis. Despite this, the company remains committed to its vision and is working hard to overcome the challenges it faces.

DISCLAIMER: The Information on this website is provided as general market commentary and does not constitute investment advice. We encourage you to do your own research before investing.

item.title: mint.fun Adds Zora And Optimistic Network Support
item.dc:creator: Annie
item.description:
mint.fun has emerged as a leading platform for users seeking to create and manage their digital assets seamlessly Zora.

Read more...

Coincu News
item.content:encoded:
Key Points:

  • mint.fun is a leading platform for digital asset creation and management, with innovative features and user-friendly interface.
  • mint.fun’s recent compatibility with the Zora Network and Optimism network has propelled the platform to new heights within the NFT community, opening up a world of opportunities for creators and collectors.
  • mint.fun’s adoption of Optimism network enables users to mint free NFTs until 9:00 PT on July 21, making NFT minting and trading more accessible and cost-effective for users.
mint.fun has emerged as a leading platform for users seeking to create and manage their digital assets seamlessly in Zora. Launched by the renowned wallet tracker Web3 Context, mint.fun has quickly gained popularity due to its innovative features and user-friendly interface.

In a recent tweet, mint.fun proudly announced its compatibility with the Zora Network and the Optimism network, propelling the platform to new heights within the NFT community. This integration opens up a world of opportunities for creators and collectors, allowing them to mint, trade, and manage NFTs efficiently across these networks.

The support for minting NFTs on the Zora Network and Optimism comes as a welcome addition to the platform’s capabilities. The Zora Network is known for its focus on creator-centric economics, empowering artists to have greater control over the value and distribution of their digital assets. With mint.fun’s integration, artists and content creators can now leverage these features seamlessly to mint and showcase their unique NFTs.

mint.fun’s adoption of the Optimism network is a significant step towards addressing the scalability challenges faced by the Ethereum blockchain. As a layer 2 solution, Optimism enhances transaction speeds and reduces gas fees, making NFT minting and trading more accessible and cost-effective for users.

mint.fun has unveiled a limited-time offer, delighting its users with a chance to mint free NFTs on the Optimism mainnet. This promotional campaign allows users to mint their digital masterpieces without incurring any costs until 9:00 PT on July 21. This incentive is expected to attract a surge of artists and collectors, further enriching the mint.fun ecosystem.

item.title: Bankless Report: Ethereum Q2 Revenue Plunges 33.3%, Addresses Drop 6%
item.dc:creator: Annie
item.description:
In the recently published Q2 2023 report by Bankless, Ethereum experienced a notable decline in various key metrics, signaling potential shifts within the ecosystem.

Read more...

Coincu News
item.content:encoded:
Key Points:

  • Ethereum experienced a significant decline in key metrics, including network revenue, burned ETH value, and daily active addresses.
  • Network revenue fell by 33.3%, indicating a slowdown in transactional volume during the period.
  • Burned ETH value dropped 35%, possibly due to factors affecting inflation control and asset scarcity.
In the recently published Q2 2023 report by Bankless, Ethereum experienced a notable decline in various key metrics, signaling potential shifts within the ecosystem.

The report revealed a concerning decrease in network revenue, burned ETH value, daily active addresses, and a surprising change in the inflation rate.

According to the report, Ethereum’s network revenue fell by a significant 33.3%, dropping from a substantial US$1.27 billion in the previous quarter to US$847 million. This decline in revenue may raise questions about the platform’s underlying economic activity and could be indicative of a slowdown in transactional volume during the given period.

Furthermore, the dollar value of burned ETH also experienced a sharp decline, plummeting 35% from $1.09 billion to $713 million. The burning of Ethereum tokens is often viewed as a measure to control inflation and maintain the scarcity of the digital asset. Such a significant decrease in the value of burned ETH may warrant further investigation into the factors influencing this development.

The report also revealed a 6% decrease in average daily active addresses, declining from 471,447 in the previous quarter to 444,419. The number of active addresses is considered a key indicator of network usage and adoption. This drop may signal reduced user engagement or potential challenges in onboarding new users during the stated period.

Additionally, the most surprising and noteworthy figure in the report was the change in the ETH inflation rate. The inflation rate decreased by an average of 213%, shifting from 0.71% to a remarkable -0.8%. This deflationary turn could have significant implications for the cryptocurrency’s value and its economic model.

DISCLAIMER: The Information on this website is provided as general market commentary and does not constitute investment advice. We encourage you to do your own research before investing.

item.title: Polygon Introduces Exclusive NFTs To Celebrate The Launch Of Polygon 2.0
item.dc:creator: Harold
item.description:
Polygon and Suku release exclusive NFT to celebrate Polygon 2.0 launch.

Read more...

Coincu News
item.content:encoded:
Key Points:

  • Polygon and Suku release exclusive NFT to celebrate Polygon 2.0 launch.
  • The upgrade aims to enhance network functionality and governance.
  • This move highlights Polygon’s significant growth and development.
Polygon and Suku have joined forces to celebrate the highly anticipated launch of Polygon 2.0 with an exclusive Open Edition NFT drop. This special NFT marks a monumental moment in the history of the network as it introduces its vision for “The Value Layer of the Internet.”

Polygon 2.0 seeks to revolutionize the network, bringing Ethereum to Internet scale and opening up new possibilities for the world of decentralized finance and blockchain applications.

The commemorative NFT, available in an open edition, is a token of appreciation to the community, recognizing their support and contribution to the platform’s growth and success. The NFT embodies the spirit of innovation and progress that defines the journey and reflects the exciting future that lies ahead with the implementation of Polygon 2.0.

To access this exclusive NFT, users need to download the Suku Wallet and log in using their Twitter account. Once logged in, the NFT will be showcased in the “Collectibles” tab, allowing users to marvel at the unique digital artwork that captures the essence of Polygon’s evolution.

For added convenience, users can also view the NFT directly on OpenSea by connecting their Suku Wallet. The minting of the NFT will be available for a limited period of 48 hours, offering users ample time to claim their piece of history on the blockchain.

However, given the immense excitement surrounding the NFT drop, Twitter may rate limit the Suku account confirmation responses, leading to potential delays in receiving responses to tweets. But users need not worry, as even if they don’t receive an immediate response, their NFTs have still been successfully minted and secured in their Suku Social Wallet.

Polygon’s journey has been characterized by significant growth and development since its inception. The platform has garnered widespread recognition and formed valuable partnerships with renowned companies, solidifying its position as a leading layer-2 scaling solution for Ethereum.

With the forthcoming release of Polygon 2.0, the platform is set to take another leap forward in reimagining various elements of the network. The upgrade will encompass improvements in tokenomics, protocol architecture, and governance, aiming to create a more robust and efficient ecosystem for developers and users alike.

The blueprint for the upgrade introduces a new governance structure based on “three main pillars,” each serving specific functions. This new approach is designed to enhance decision-making, community participation, and overall network security, paving the way for a more decentralized and inclusive ecosystem.

As Polygon continues to evolve and explore innovative solutions, the NFT drop, in collaboration with Suku, represents a symbolic celebration of progress, community support, and the exciting future that awaits with Polygon 2.0. This significant step forward reaffirms the network’s commitment to pushing the boundaries of blockchain technology and making decentralized finance accessible to the masses.

item.title: Apple Develops Groundbreaking GPT Language Model And Chat Robot
item.dc:creator: Annie
item.description:
Key Points: Apple has developed its own framework, “Ajax,” for building large language models. The tech giant has been working diligently on this infrastructure, which is poised to revolutionize language processing in the tech industry. Leveraging the power of Ajax is internally referred to as “Apple GPT.” This cutting-edge chatbot service is expected to enhance […]

Read more...

Coincu News
item.content:encoded:
Key Points:

  • Apple is revolutionizing language processing and enhancing user experiences with its new framework “Ajax” and chatbot service “Apple GPT”.
  • The company is focused on developing AI to offer groundbreaking services and products while ensuring user data security and privacy protection.
  • As industry insiders affirm, the future integration of Ajax and the Apple GPT chatbot service holds the promise of revolutionizing how users interact with their devices and applications, providing a glimpse into the exciting possibilities of the AI-powered future.
Apple has developed its own framework, “Ajax,” for building large language models. The tech giant has been working diligently on this infrastructure, which is poised to revolutionize language processing in the tech industry.

Leveraging the power of Ajax is internally referred to as “Apple GPT.” This cutting-edge chatbot service is expected to enhance user experiences and provide innovative solutions across various applications.

The drive towards artificial intelligence has emerged as a major focus for AP in recent months, with multiple teams within the company collaborating on the project. The objective is to harness the potential of AI to offer groundbreaking services and products to its consumers.

As with any technology that involves AI, privacy concerns are paramount. Apple’s dedicated teams are working diligently to address and mitigate potential privacy issues associated with the use of language models and chatbot services. Ensuring user data security and privacy protection is at the forefront of Apple’s priorities.

Industry insiders with knowledge of the matter have affirmed that the development of Ajax and the AP GPT chatbot service are part of a comprehensive AI strategy aimed at reshaping the company’s offerings and advancing its competitive edge.

However, while the progress on these projects has been impressive, Apple executives have yet to make a final decision on how and when to introduce these groundbreaking tools to consumers. The company is actively considering the most effective and responsible approach to ensure seamless integration and maximum user benefit.

Apple’s emphasis on AI development reflects the company’s commitment to continuously improving user experiences and pushing the boundaries of what’s possible with technology. As consumers eagerly await the release of these AI-driven tools, Apple remains steadfast in its dedication to delivering products that are not only cutting-edge but also uphold the highest standards of privacy and security. The future integration of Ajax and the Apple GPT chatbot service holds the promise of revolutionizing how users interact with their devices and applications, providing a glimpse into the exciting possibilities of the AI-powered future.

item.title: Ethereum Solidity 0.8.21 Release Empowers Smart Contracts
item.dc:creator: Annie
item.description:
The programming language Solidity has officially released version 0.8.21.

Read more...

Coincu News
item.content:encoded:
Key Points:

  • Solidity 0.8.21 released with new features and bug fixes.
  • Ability to access events in other contracts and relaxed restrictions on immutable variable initialization.
  • Continuous improvement underscores Ethereum community’s commitment to advancing the blockchain’s capabilities.
The programming language Solidity has officially released version 0.8.21.

This release comes with several enhancements and bug fixes, further empowering developers to create efficient and secure smart contracts on the Ethereum blockchain.

One of the key features introduced version 0.8.21 is the ability to access events in other contracts with full qualification. This enhancement simplifies contract interactions and opens up new possibilities for seamless communication between smart contracts. With fully qualified event access, developers can now leverage events from external contracts more effectively, enhancing the overall functionality and interoperability of their dApps.

The new version of Solidity relaxes restrictions on immutable variable initialization. This update streamlines the process of initializing immutable variables, providing developers with more flexibility and ease when deploying smart contracts. By easing these restrictions, Solidity enables developers to optimize contract deployment and improve overall efficiency.

Version 0.8.21 addresses critical issues in the code generator and the Yul optimizer, among others. By fixing these bugs, Solidity ensures greater stability and reliability for smart contract development. Eliminating potential vulnerabilities and enhancing the performance of the compiler and optimizer, the update reinforces the security and robustness of smart contracts on the Ethereum network.

The continuous improvement of Solidity underscores the Ethereum community’s commitment to advancing the blockchain’s capabilities and fostering a thriving ecosystem of decentralized applications. With each iteration, Solidity empowers developers to build more complex and innovative smart contracts, unlocking the full potential of decentralized finance (DeFi) and other blockchain-based applications.

Developers and users alike can look forward to a more seamless and efficient experience in building and interacting with Ethereum smart contracts, thanks to the latest version of Solidity. By incorporating feedback from the community and addressing critical issues, the Solidity team demonstrates their dedication to ensuring the language remains a leading choice for Ethereum-based dApps and projects.

As the Ethereum ecosystem continues to evolve, updates like Solidity version 0.8.21 play a crucial role in driving adoption and innovation. The release reflects the collaborative efforts of the Ethereum community to create a robust and user-friendly platform for decentralized applications.

With the latest version now available, developers are encouraged to explore the new features and enhancements, while also benefiting from the bug fixes to ensure their smart contracts operate optimally on the Ethereum blockchain. As the adoption of blockchain technology grows, Solidity’s continuous evolution will undoubtedly contribute to a more vibrant and decentralized future.

DISCLAIMER: The Information on this website is provided as general market commentary and does not constitute investment advice. We encourage you to do your own research before investing.
